data.title: travel agency, kayaking holiday
meta_keywords: speed boat tours in the bay of Kotor
data.meta_description: Adventure Montenegro - Montenegro's Active Holidays Specialist offers multi day and single day active tours at Adriatic sea and Montenegro mountains ...
data.text:
DAY 1 - transfer

Transfer from the airport to Kotor , accommodation in three stars hotel or apartments. Welcome dinner in traditional sea food restaurant Cesarica in Kotor Old town.

DAY 2 - Bay of Kotor

Paddling from Kotor to village Prcanj, discovering magnificent coastal churches, learn something about unique marine life and rich history of Kotor and the surrounding villages. A paddle around the Bay of Kotor and you will be rewarded with views on Old town and its fortress. They are considered as one of the worldâs historic values. Relax on the beach , the perfect spots for swimming and snorkelling or stop at one of the small villages for a cold drink. During the evening enjoy in the Old town of Kotor. Paddling distance approx. 8 km Meals provided : breakfast and dinner

DAY 3 - Perast, Our Lady of the rocks

Sea kayaking around islands in The Bay of Kotor : Our Lady of The Rocks and St George. Begin from village Markov Vrt, we will paddle to small baroque town Perast. You will see buildings and villas, which were built during the city's prosperous years of the 17th and 18th centuries, and will hear the history of this fascinating town, see Church Islands of St George and paddle around the Island of Our Lady of the Rock - its original church was built in 1452. You'll see the stunning present church, built in 1632 and enlarged in 1722. Kayaking continues to the beach Verige where we will stop and you will have an opportunity to swim, snorkel and simply enjoy the great landscapes of the surrounding mountains. Paddling distance approx. 8 km Meals provided : breakfast and dinner

DAY 4 - Bay of Tivat, Porto Montenegro

Our paddling in The Bay of Tivat starts from village DonjaLastva towards the small coastal town Tivat , the central part of bay. On our way we will enjoy in sightseeing and scenic views on Porto Montenegro. This is a Luxury yacht marina for mega yachts , with over 600 marina berths, luxury residences, sports facility, yacht club and infinity pool. From Porto Montenegro we will continue to island of St. Mark where you can really enjoy in that uninhabited island, beautiful scenery and swimming in the crystal clear water. Paddling distance : 10 km Meals provided : breakfast and dinner

DAY 5 - Bajova kula, Orahovac

We are starting from the beach Bajova Kula, a very attractive beach and a favourite picnic place of the local people from Kotor. It was named after the legendary hero Bajo Pivljanin who built the tower to be his shelter in times between battles. It is pebbly, 60 m long, and the sea water is extremely clear. In the background of the beach, there is a dense greenery of laurel trees, the pleasant smell of which makes the experience of sunbathing and swimming complete. From Bajova Kula we will paddle to Ljuta , a village named after the river which flows through it. In the central part of the Ljuta, surrounded by a cliffs near the sea, there is a Baroque church dedicated to St. Peter. It was built with cut stone blocks that are locals - sailors brought from Korcula. Then, we will continue to SvetiStasije , the most beautiful vacation point in entire Kotor bay, if you like peace and calm atmosphere. The water is pure and clear even in the highest season. It is very peaceful and meditating, with adorable shore and an old church. There you can enjoy the beautiful scenery and swim in the crystal clear water, where it ends unforgettable kayaking adventures in the Bay of Kotor. Paddling distance : 10 km Meals provided : breakfast and dinner

DAY 6 - Skadar lake

Kayaking at the Rijeka Crnojevica on the SkadarLake ,which once was an important trading centre in Montenegro. The small village Rijeka Crnojevica provides an enchanting setting and is the perfect starting point for kayakers venturing into Skadar Lake, the last habitat of the pelicans in Europe, the biggest bird reservation in Europe, one of the last freshwater marshes in the Mediterranean and one of the the largest freshwater lake in Balkan peninsula. This kayak journey has been tailored for both beginners and accomplished paddlers. Our main ambition is to allow you to discover this amazing country, slowly, in touch with its history, people and culture. At the end of the tour we will stop at a restaurant overlooking Skadar Lake and all are welcome to enjoy in lunch and drink. Paddling distance : 6 km Meals provided : breakfast and lunch

DAY 7 - relax beach day

Montenegro Coast .Today you will have a chance to visit some of the picturesque beaches in Kotor and spend several hours at one of them. It is possible to snorkel in the crystal clear waters, enjoy a cooling swim or spend the last day relaxing in the sun with a good book. This evening a farewell meal will be served in a local restaurant for a chance to reflect on the weeks adventures. Meals provided : breakfast and dinner

DAY 8 - transfer

Transfer to the airport for your return flight
